intro: Balaustion, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the genus Saintpaulia and is characterized by its compact, bushy growth habit. The plant features velvety, dark green leaves and produces showy, pentagonal flowers in shades of purple, pink, and white. Balaustion thrives in well-drained soil and requires bright, indirect light to flourish. It is a popular houseplant due to its ornamental value and relatively easy care requirements.
